rows.label: bf02130100_0010
rows.name:
This whole thing with Core Crystals,
touching them to create Blades...

rows.label: bf02130100_0020
rows.name:
It's pretty amazing when
you think about it.

rows.label: bf02130100_0030
rows.name:
We Blades start out formless, anchored
to the world only by our Core Crystal.

rows.label: bf02130100_0040
rows.name:
Only the touch of a potential can
imbue us with form and being.

rows.label: bf02130100_0050
rows.name:
And it is by those forms
we come to be known.

rows.label: bf02130100_0060
rows.name:
So you see, my boy, in some ways it
is only the fated touch of a Driver

rows.label: bf02130100_0070
rows.name: that allows the Blades to exist at all.

rows.label: bf02130100_0080
rows.name:
Wow... Why does it happen
that way, though?

rows.label: bf02130100_0090
rows.name:
Now that is something no one knows.
It's just how it's always been.

rows.label: bf02130100_0100
rows.name:
Blades come in all shapes and sizes.
Some human-shaped, some not.

rows.label: bf02130100_0110
rows.name:
Some people say the shape depends
on the kinda person the Driver is.

rows.label: bf02130100_0120
rows.name:
The resonance between Blade and
Driver is a mysterious thing.
